frontmatter.title: Community Day and OpenShift Commons Gathering at Red Hat Summit 2025
frontmatter.price: Included in your Red Hat Summit Registration
frontmatter.registration_text: Register through the Red Hat Summit Site
frontmatter.lead_text: This year we will be hosting Community Day and OpenShift Commons Gathering at Red Hat Summit on May 19 in Boston, Massachusetts
frontmatter.info_text: Community Day and OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live in Boston, Massachusetts. As always, our focus is on creating a space for peer-to-peer interactions. This Gathering will focus on Case Studies from and by End Users with production deployments of OpenShift sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way. Topics covered during this Gathering include hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and new Emerging technology initiatives.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held in Boston, Massachusetts. Please note -  Attendees are required to register for Red Hat Summit. There will be a Red Hat Summit and AnsibleFest Kickoff Party in the evening.
